import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Star from '../Assets/Image/Star.png' const ProductCard = ({ data }) => { return ( <>
{data.Title}
{data.delievery_charge === null ? 'free shipping' : ''}
{data.brandData.name}

{data.Price.sell_price.$numberDecimal} ({data.Price.current_store_price.$numberDecimal})
9% OFF

) } export default ProductCard
